meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>employ</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to employ</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You are going <vocabulary>to employ</vocabulary> more people to your business so you can make more money and eventually buy a <reading>yacht</reading> (やと). That's the dream life, it is.
